    Nick Partridge: Scalaz

    By Chris Myers May 27, 2013 Permalink

    [embed]http://vimeo.com/10482466[/embed]

    This is an oldie but a goodie. Nick Partridge (@nkpart) shows the Melbourne Scala Users group Scalaz and how its typeclasses are derived. There is a useful focus on Validations (right biased Either's) and how it accumulates errors. The talk can be found on vimeo here.
